subtitles:
45045 48257 People once believed
that when someone dies...

48382 52636 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

52719 56098 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

56181 61436 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

61562 64565 Then, sometimes--
just sometimes--

64690 69653 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

124249 128754 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

128879 133050 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

136553 140182 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

140265 143310 - All right, guys, let's do it.
- Devil's fuckin' Night.

143393 146730 - What's the count so far?
- 1 43 fires.

146813 149608 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

149691 154571 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

157533 160869 Yeah, I remember.
But you guys just can't come in here
and take her away like this.

160953 165457 There are procedures to stick by.
You guys should have
cleared this with me first.

165541 168085 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

168168 171046 - We found her, Detective,
and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

171129 173423 I didn't give the order
to move her.

173507 176301 Jesus, Albrecht. I can see why they
took away your gold shield.

176385 180347 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
180430 184142 All right, clear out of here.

184226 186311 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

188272 193610 - Where's Eric?
-Just don't worry about him.

193694 195863 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

195988 199074 Look, I will. You just, uh,
lie back. Come on, come on.

209418 211587 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

211670 216008 Yeah, look. Your sister--
she's gonna be okay.

216091 220179 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.

220304 223056 She's my friend.
Her and Eric.

226143 230230 - You lied to her about Eric.
- Look, I had to.

230314 233817 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.
233901 235903 She's gonna die, isn't she?

244953 250626 Now, come on.
Come on, it's okay.
252753 254838 She's gonna be fine.

273148 277486 A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

277569 280155 I used to think
that was true about everything--
280239 284618 families, friends, feelings.

284701 288622 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

288747 293001 two people who are meant to be
together-- nothing can keep them apart.

331373 334501 What are you,
like the night watchman?

355898 358066 You know, what
this place needs...
358150 361153 is a good natural catastrophe.

361236 365365 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

365449 369161 Mickey, come on, man. You-- You got
to put the mustard underneath first.

369244 371538 Maybe a flood
like in the Bible.
371622 374666 Hey, hey, hey, let me do it.

374750 378795 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

378879 382299 Come on. Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me. Lots of onions.

382424 385761 - All right, here you go.
- Hey, all right.
385844 388472 Now we're talkin'.
388555 393018 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

393101 396939 - How do you steer that thing
on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

397022 400567 See, now, Sarah, she's a genuine
hot dogger. You hungry?

400692 402819 - You buyin'?
- I'm buyin'.

402903 406615 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
406698 409868 They make you fart big time.

actually caught on fire once...

418836 421630 from all the crap
floating around in it.
422965 425884 I wish I could have seen that.
486820 490115 Fire it up! Yeah!

530447 534368 - Fire it up! We busted their machines!

557391 560727 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-Bird, cop car, cop car.

on the street tonight.

576660 579037 - Damn it!

- What was that?

579121 581123 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
581206 584668 Mickey, call it in for me!

678595 682182 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!

682266 686270 Code violations?
Safety hazards?
686353 688522 Place looks fine to me.
688605 691400 Let's redecorate.
694987 697072 ''Abashed, the devil stood...
697155 700826 and felt how awful goodness is.

700951 705497 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely.''
It's pornography.
718677 721388 No, no, no, no, me first.

769228 772105 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

775484 779905 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

779988 782866 Look at that.
Look at that.

my new favourite holiday.
787371 790832 To Devil's Night.

794419 796880 You sick fuck.

- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
836336 839089 Fire it up! Fire it up!

if we're wanting to

995495 999958 Dreaming the crow-black dream

take it or leave it.
1032741 1036036 Right there for ya.

1043877 1047172 child molestin',
saprophyte motherfucker.

1050342 1052636 real good, massa.

1109234 1113030 They keep calling me
1114198 1117367 Keep on calling me
1118952 1122206 They keep calling me

up for, crackhead, huh?
1179555 1182266 Halloween ain't till ma√±ana.
1224349 1227728 Fuck you, murderer!

1227811 1230522 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1234735 1238113 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1238197 1240741 -You're out of your motherfucking mind--

1240824 1245621 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them on Halloween.

1245787 1250667 Yeah, yeah, right, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.
1250792 1253212 Her name was Shelly.

1253295 1256298 You cut her.
You raped her.

1256381 1262179 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1271438 1276360 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1276443 1281031 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1285619 1288288 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1290040 1292042 We never miss.
1300968 1303762 Try harder. Try again!
1308851 1313605 Victims. Aren't we all?

1324616 1330455 Sometimes it rains
inside my head
1330539 1334126 When the words run dry

1334209 1338338 And the walls are breathing
Hands are--

1338422 1342676 - Look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
- Yeah, it's a mess.

1347890 1349975 No, they don't
have to take you

1350058 1352811 I got to go upstairs.

1352895 1357482 No, they don't

1357566 1362196 - Get out of my way, you worms!
- No, they don't have to take you away

1362279 1366116 Give me some of that

1366200 1369620 Why don't you ladies
come by later? Check me out.

1369703 1374708 Hey, guess what.
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1379338 1383425 Gather your soldiers. You're on

1383509 1387012 - Is the man in?

1416500 1418502 You're thinking
about the past.
1423465 1425634 Dad gave me this.
1425717 1429888 Fifth birthday.

1447990 1450993 Is she asleep?
1457207 1459501 I think we broke her.
1464381 1466550 I love her eyes.

have to take you away

1493702 1496079 I don't hate them
1496205 1498540 But I know them

hangin' 'round

1505756 1508300 Don't fuck with me.

1516308 1520312 She's busy. Go play with

1520395 1522814 I don't have any dolls.

1524900 1529238 - Get some food, huh?
- Somebody already bought me dinner.

1534952 1538622 ''Somebody already bought me dinner.

1548632 1553554 Thirty, I go 40 dollars.

unless you want to get mutilated.
1572364 1574783 Always got to dick off.

1574867 1578829 Goddamn creatures of the night,

1587129 1590841 ''Suddenly I heard a tapping,
as if someone...

1590966 1593844 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door.''
1596597 1598932 What are you talking about?
1599057 1601894 You heard me rapping, right?

1601977 1606148 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1608525 1611987 - I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.
- Yeah?

1612070 1615365 - Gold.
- You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

1624833 1627377 Shit on me.
Shit on me!

1634468 1636720 Mr Gideon.
You're not paying attention.

1644686 1649733 I repeat,
a gold engagement ring, yes?

1649816 1653654 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1657407 1660035 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

1665040 1670420 - Who's this sack of shit?
- That's Tin Tin, one of
T-Bird's little helpers.

1670504 1673507 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1673590 1676426 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1676510 1680556 This could be a turf hit, but it
doesn't look like your usual gang crap.

1680639 1685435 Oh, come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1685561 1687896 I'm supposed to thank you
for that, right?

1687980 1691275 Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

1692484 1694862 What the hell
do you call that?

1696905 1702369 I call it blood, Detective. I suppose

1702452 1705205 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1713172 1716133 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?
- Don't you know this game?

1716216 1720554 What game are you talking about?
Okay, the rings.
I'll tell you about the rings!

1720637 1725392 They're in that-that metal box!

1725517 1730647 Take-- Take the fucking rings out! You

1734234 1736820 - Look, it goes up to the attic.

1753670 1757925 Oh, it's beautiful.

1781782 1784701 - You have one chance to live.

1784785 1788914 - Thank you.

1788997 1792918 Now you're going to tell me

1793001 1795003 The Pit. They all

1795087 1800968 All of T-Birds's little potato-heads

1801051 1804972 - Funboy.

1805055 1807474 - Shit!

1807558 1810310 - Stop! Stop! Please!

1825534 1827744 I'm not gonna kill you.

1840507 1844803 Tell them Eric Draven

1846847 1850767 You walk outta here,

2013180 2015807 You are very restless.

2015891 2018894 Just wish I was a little

2018977 2023482 - Be careful of what you ask for.

2034826 2037996 There are energies
aligning against you.

2063730 2066066 Nobody cleared this

2066149 2068110 I didn't have nothing

2068193 2070654 Well, sure.

2070737 2074950 I got trouble. One of

2103061 2108025 Is that a natural catastrophe

2143018 2145604 Let go, you creep!

2150776 2154071 You need to slow down,

I could have made it.

2169378 2174258 It's more like surfing than skating.

2175425 2178929 - It can't rain all the time.

2195946 2200492 Don't thank me. Are we

2205038 2209293 Annie, look at that.

2216133 2219178 for a very nice girl who found herself

2366033 2368911 Don't sweat it.

2394019 2396897 You need professional help.

2435519 2437729 ''Can you put me up
for the night?''

2443318 2448532 - Does that hurt?

2450742 2454162 Look what you've done

2478395 2480355 I've got a gun

2483400 2486111 You're happy to see me,

2503879 2507758 Stay away!
Stay away from me!

2519561 2523982 Mother is the name for God

2524066 2528820 Do you understand?

2540249 2544044 Your daughter is out there

2576034 2579830 If I wanted ice, I would have

2581582 2584293 Fill it up yourself,

2584376 2587087 I really need this.

2597514 2600684 -You burn yourself playing with matches?

2600767 2603937 - You have an appointment.

Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2608650 2611778 Get my friend here

2611862 2615699 - Hey, hey, hon!

2620078 2623248 You stay put right there.
2632716 2634801 Get away, steamhead.

2666875 2670838 Well, as you can see,
I'm here on the corner of 2 7th Street
and East Washington Place...

2670921 2674383 the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2674466 2677928 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see
across the street from me...
2678011 2680222 was totally demolished by fire.

2680305 2684977 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies, but cost

2685060 2689982 In fact, if it weren't
for the constant surveillance
by the local police precincts--
2692901 2697322 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2703662 2707374 You-- You died. You got buried.
2707457 2709960 You still have your hat on.
2712254 2714715 I gotta sit down.
2724558 2728854 are you some kind of-- of ghost?

2738530 2743035 I don't know what I am. I need you

2745078 2749124 Well, you took a six-story
swan dive out of a window.
2749208 2752294 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2752377 2756965 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

2757049 2759426 I mean, come on.
Read the file.

2759510 2763430 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.

2763514 2767184 And her body finally

2767267 2770687 I saw it, man.

2781240 2783116 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!

2790415 2793585 - You okay?
- I saw her.

2795671 2800884 I saw her through your eyes.
You stayed with her the whole time.

2800968 2806765 Yeah, well, you got
to understand something, all right?

2806890 2810686 I was-- I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2810811 2814648 Uh, give me something
I could work with.

2819528 2822030 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2822155 2825409 You think any of those people
in that building-- even the ones
who signed the petition--

2825492 2828954 would talk after
what happened to you?
2829079 2832249 I kept asking questions and...

2832374 2835002 finally got busted for sticking my nose
where it wasn't wanted.
2839006 2840966 This your wife?

2841049 2845554 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not any more.
We're getting a divorce.

2850475 2854021 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2854104 2856440 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2856523 2859985 Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

2870537 2875167 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2880214 2883091 You gonna vanish
into thin air again?

2886887 2889389 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2892392 2898273 Look, man, um, I'm sorry
as hell for what happened
to you and your girlfriend.

2910244 2912871 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2912955 2915582 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2915707 2919211 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2919294 2922506 - Other than that, my day sucked.
